channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: This Week in Explainers: How India’s air force has outranked China’s
History Today: When US purchased Alaska from Russia
Muammar Gaddafi’s son Hannibal released on bail. What happened to family after Libyan leader's death?
How a Hyderabad paediatrician waged 8-year battle to have ORS tags removed from energy drinks
In Graphics | How much gold is there in the world?
What is the connection between Angelina Jolie and prostate cancer?
Gaza ceasefire shows Trump’s personality cult, not genuine peacebuilding
item.description: The US president applies his template of transactionalism everywhere without recognising its limitations

item.title: Trump’s Pakistan gamble should alarm India, Afghanistan
item.description: The US silence, as the ISI funds and shelters IS-KP members in Balochistan and builds centres for the LeT, JeM and Hizbul in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, is nothing but complicity in Pakistan’s sinister designs

item.title: How Western media vilifies Sheikh Hasina and favours Yunus's regime in Bangladesh
item.description: Hasina’s legacy deserves critical scrutiny, yes — but it also demands fair and balanced reporting, not trial by innuendo

item.title: Two steeds on the steppe: India and Mongolia chart a path beyond Beijing’s shadow
item.description: Mongolian President Khurelsukh Ukhnaa’s state visit to India this week, marking the 70th anniversary of diplomatic relations, represents far more than ceremonial pageantry

item.title: In the era of Trumpian diplomacy, Modi’s silence speaks loudest
item.description: Skipping the Gaza peace summit in Egypt was not a ‘missed opportunity’ but a diplomatic masterstroke

item.title: PoK unrest exposes the cracks in Pakistan’s Kashmir propaganda
item.description: The unrest in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir is not an isolated burst of anger but a cumulative reaction to systemic exploitation and the denial of basic democratic rights in a region Pakistan claims to champion
